section.name: Cayenne News Archive
section.p: This release includes support for shared and local caching of query results, a complete GUI support for all types of queries, and also lots of bug fixes.. For details see release notes and upgrade instructions.

M7 Note: There was a bug discovered in M7 that prevents JavaGroups remote notifications from happenning. If you are using JavaGroups notifications feature please upgrade to M7_1. Otherwise M7 should work just fine.
This release includes SQLTemplate, a scriptable raw SQL query, and also a number of bug fixes and other enhancements. For details see release notes and upgrade instructions.

This release includes two major new features - optimistic locking and entity inheritance, and also a number of bug fixes and other enhancements. For details see release notes and upgrade instructions.
This release fixes serious bugs found in M3, adds suppport for to-one relationships with an FK column target and implements performance enhancements for to-many relationships.
This release features major enhancement of Expressions API and allows to build SelectQueries using CayenneModeler.

p.strong: Release 1.1a-pre2 of Cayenne and Cayenne Examples

section.p:
Cayenne and Cayenne Examples 1.1a-pre2 (Second Alpha Preview) are released. This release features 1.1 release. Among its features are:
Modeler and API support for container-managed transactions
Cayenne with SessionBean facade JBoss example
"Import DataMap" function in CayenneModeler
MS SQL Server Adapter
various bug fixes
Cayenne 1.0.6 is released. It contains extended implementation of in-memory Expressions evaluation and numerous bug fixes.
Cayenne 1.0.3 is available for download. It fixes numerous bugs (including a few serious ones), and adds a few new features:

ul.li: Class generation via Modeler or Ant would create "public static final String" class variables for all class property names, and also for the column names of the entity PK.
New API added to transfer objects between DataContexts.
Iterator over IncrementalFaultList is now "lazy", and will resolve objects one page at a time.

section.p: Cayenne Examples 1.0.3 is available for download. It contains new aggregate queries mapping example. Examples documentation is now a part of the main Cayenne site.

p.strong: Cayenne in "The Best Freeware And Shareware" of DB Magazine, Japan

section.p: A December 2003 edition of the DB Magazine, a 250-page software tecnology magazine published in Japanese, includes Cayenne in the selection of "The Best Freeware & Shareware". Cayenne 1.0 is also distributed on the CD that comes with the magazine.
Cayenne 1.0.2 is available for download. It contains a number of adapter fixes, as well as support for binary primary keys.
Many thanks to our graphic artist Anna Drapeza who created this elegant site design! Sadly enough good artistic work is still a rare thing in the OpenSource world.

u.strong: National Hockey League Switches to Cayenne

section.p: After the initial trial of Cayenne last October, NHL switched all their public applications running at NHL.com to use Cayenne. With the help from ObjectStyle and Central Park Software the site was successfully launched to production. Currently applications receive more than 5 million hits a day.
